application_details: Lundbeck succeeded in its counterclaim but sought higher costs due to complexity and a settlement offer
Apotex argued for mid-level Column IV costs
decision_reasoning: Costs awarded at high-end of Column IV with double costs post-settlement offer until close of argument
cause_of_action: Patent infringement dispute over Canadian Patent No. 1,339,452
procedure_followed: 26-day trial followed by cost determination motion involving detailed analysis of tariff items
result_of_case: Lundbeck received partial costs, including double costs post-offer, but not at the highest tariff level requested
